News.headline: Match Preview: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League away match against North Ferriby United on Saturday
News.description:
The Daggers will be looking to complete the double over North Ferriby to aid they promotion push.

North Ferriby currently sit 22nd in the Vanarama National League but have won 3 of their last 4 league games.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 3-0 Braintree
Braintree 3-2 Daggers
Daggers 4-4 Solihull Moors
Daggers 1-2 Worthing
Dover 1-2 Daggers

North Ferriby
York 0-1 North Ferriby
North Ferriby 0-1 York
Maidstone 1-2 North Ferriby
Alfreton 1-0 North Ferriby (FA Trophy)
North Ferriby 1-0 Gateshead

Team News
Okenabihrie and Robson both started on the bench on Monday with the former making a substitute appearance. Both players will be looking to continue their recovery from injuries. Howell, Williams, Pennell and Robinson all set to still miss out

Previous Meetings
This will be the first visit to North Ferriby for the Daggers. The home fixture in September ended in a 2-0 Daggers win with Hawkins and Howell getting the goals that day.

Fixtures
There is a total of 9 Vanarama National League fixtures this weekend with others involved in the Emirates FA cup. All 3:00pm KOâ€™s.

Aldershot v Southport
Braintree v Chester
Bromley v Forest Green
Dover v York
Guiseley v Maidstone
North Ferriby v Dagenham and Redbridge
Solihull v Gateshead
Torquay v Boreham Wood
Wrexham v Woking

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
